events.title: Latte Art Throwdown
events.description: Baristas compete, you judge. Free tasting flights for spectators. Sign up to compete — all skill levels welcome.

events.title: Cupping Session
events.description: Join our roaster to taste and score new single origins before they hit the menu. Learn to identify tasting notes like a pro.

events.title: Vinyl & Vibes
events.description: Live DJs spin vinyl while you sip. Craft cocktail-style coffee drinks available. No cover.

events.title: Morning Yoga + Cold Brew
events.description: Flow on the patio, cold brew after. Mats provided. All levels. $10 includes a drink of your choice.

events.title: Open Mic Night
events.description: Poetry, acoustic sets, comedy — bring whatever you've got. Sign-up starts at 6:30 PM. Supportive crowd guaranteed.

events.title: Brew Methods Workshop
events.description: V60, AeroPress, Chemex, French Press — master them all. Take home a bag of beans. $25 per person.
